long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
DevGiggles: Add Fun and Humor to Your Coding Sessions

Bring joy to your coding and research with DevGiggles! This Chrome extension delivers a steady stream of funny programming memes directly to your screen, helping developers stay motivated and entertained during long coding sessions. Whether you're debugging code, working through complex projects, or need a quick mental break, DevGiggles offers the perfect way to stay productive and keep your creativity flowing.

Inject humor into your workflow, keep spirits high, and make coding fun again with DevGiggles!

Key Features:
Random programming memes: Receive a variety of hilarious coding memes to break up the monotony of intense work sessions.
Non-intrusive design: Enjoy short, lighthearted breaks without leaving your workspace.
Customizable frequency: Set the days and frequency for receiving memes based on your coding schedule.
Screen position control: Choose where memes appearâ€”on the left or right side of your screen for an optimal experience.
Targeted display: Opt to show memes only on developer-centric sites like GitHub, Stack Overflow, and other frequently visited sites, or let them appear across all websites you browse.
Install DevGiggles now to inject some laughter into your day and keep coding fun!
